com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.update

Class Update

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.update.Update

  • public class Update
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to define the updates to be perform on a document.
    Since:
    12.07.16.

      • remove

        public <T> Update remove(FieldDescriptor<T> descriptor,
                         T... t)
        Prepares a group of values to be removed from a specific field of the document. If no values are provided (null or empty list) the field is removed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of content the field can store.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FieldDescriptor indicates the field where the values are removed from.
        t - values to be deleted from the document field.
        Returns:
        Update object set to remove the specified values from the field.

      • removeRegex

        public Update removeRegex(MultiValueFieldDescriptor<?> descriptor,
                          java.lang.String s)
        Prepares to remove those values, from a multivalued field, which matches with the given regex.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - MultiValueFieldDescriptor indicates the field where the values are removed from.
        s - String regex matching the values to be deleted.
        Returns:
        Update object set to remove the specified regex matching values from the field.

        public <T> Update set(SingleValueFieldDescriptor<T> descriptor,

      • getOptions

        public java.util.HashMap<FieldDescriptor<?>,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.SortedSet<UpdateOperation>>> getOptions()
        Get the updates prepared in the Update instance.
        Returns:
        HashMap<FieldDescriptor<?>, HashMap<String, Object>> A map of FieldDescriptor as key and as value a map with key Update.UpdateOperations and value the modifier values.

      • context

        public Update context(java.lang.String context)
        Sets the update context.
        Parameters:
        context - String context to be searched in.
        Returns:
        This Update instance with the new context.

        public java.lang.String getUpdateContext()

        Returns:
